# Blogdown website with Hugo-theme-learn

This is a tutorial website for demonstrating how to use R [blogdown](https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown) with [hugo-learn-theme](https://github.com/matcornic/hugo-theme-learn) to painlessly create pretty documentation sites.
